scripts.prettify: for component in 'suites' 'worker' 'core' 'client'; do npm --prefix $component run prettify; done
scripts.lint: for component in 'suites' 'worker' 'core' 'client'; do npm --prefix $component run lint; done
scripts.preinstall: for component in 'suites' 'worker' 'core' 'client'; do npm --prefix $component install; done

hooks.pre-commit: for component in 'suites' 'worker' 'core' 'client'; do pushd $component && lint-staged && popd ; done
